component.description: FileUpload goes beyond the browser input type="file" functionality and features a flash-javascript solution for uploading files. File filtering, multiple uploads, partial page rendering and progress tracking are the significant features compared to legacy fileUploads.
component.attributes:
&input_component_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
style false java.lang.String Inline style of the main component.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the component.
update false java.lang.String Component(s) to be updated after fileupload completes.
process false java.lang.String Component(s) to be processed during fileupload request.
fileUploadListener false javax.el.MethodExpression void fileUploadListener(org.primefaces.event.FileUploadEvent) Method expression to listen file upload events.
multiple false java.lang.Boolean false Allows choosing of multi file uploads from native file browse dialog, turned off by default.
auto false java.lang.Boolean false When set to true, selecting a file starts the upload process implicitly. Default is false.
label false java.lang.String Choose Label of the browse button, default is 'Choose'.
allowTypes false java.lang.String Regular expression for accepted file types, e.g. /(\.|\/)(gif|jpe?g|png)$/
fileLimit false java.lang.Integer java.lang.Integer.MAX_VALUE Maximum number of files to be uploaded.
sizeLimit false java.lang.Long java.lang.Long.MAX_VALUE Individual file size limit in bytes. Default is unlimited.
mode false java.lang.String advanced Mode of the uploader, valid values are "simple" and "advanced".
uploadLabel false java.lang.String Upload Label of the upload button, default is 'Upload'.
cancelLabel false java.lang.String Cancel Label of the cancel button, default is 'Cancel'.
invalidSizeMessage false java.lang.String Message to display when file size validation fails.
invalidFileMessage false java.lang.String Message to display when file limit validation fails.
fileLimitMessage false java.lang.String Message to display when file count validation fails.
dragDropSupport false java.lang.Boolean true Specifies dragdrop based file selection from filesystem, default is true and works only on supported browsers.
onstart false java.lang.String Callback to execute at the beginning of fileupload.
oncomplete false java.lang.String Callback to execute after fileupload request completes.
onerror false java.lang.String Callback to execute after fileupload request fails.
disabled false java.lang.Boolean false Disables fileupload user interface interaction.
messageTemplate false java.lang.String Message template to use when displaying file validation errors. Default is "{name} {size}".
previewWidth false java.lang.Integer 80 Width for image previews in pixels. Default value is 80.
skinSimple false java.lang.Boolean false Applies theming to simple uploader, default is false.
accept false java.lang.String To filter files in native file browser dialog.
sequential false java.lang.Boolean false Uploads are concurrent by default set this option to true for sequential uploads.
